greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows which lists the squares of the parts of A135010.
comment: Volumes of the parts in the section model of partitions version "boxes" in which each part of size k has a volume = k^2. Row sums of this triangle give A206440 and partial sums of A206440 give A066183.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..23, flattened
mathematica: Table[Reverse@ConstantArray[{1}, PartitionsP[n - 1]] ~Join~ DeleteCases[Sort@PadRight[Reverse/@Cases[IntegerPartitions[n], x_ /; Last[x] != 1]], x_ /; x == 0, 2], {n, 1, 8}] ^2  // Flatten (* _Robert Price_, May 28 2020 *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 08 2012
